title: Kouya no Kotobuki Hikoutai (The Magnificent Kotobuki)
synopsis: In a barren frontier where people trade goods with each other in order to help each other survive. The Kotobuki Squadron are bodyguards for hire, led by a strict but beautiful squadron leader, an unreliable commanding officer, and a true artisan of a crew chief. Alongside pilots who don't lack for personality, they take to the air in dogfights, letting the engine noise of their Hayabusa fighters ring out in the skies.
related_anime: ['Kouya no Kotobuki Hikoutai Gaiden: Oozora no Harukaze Hikoutai', 'Kouya no Kotobuki Hikoutai Kanzenban', 'Kouya no Kotobuki Hikoutai']
